description: This file is a BitBake include (.inc) recipe for building the CUPS (Common UNIX Printing System) software, detailing dependencies, build configurations, installation procedures, and package information.

classes.name: autotools-brokensep
classes.description: Utility class for handling broken autotools build systems.

classes.name: binconfig
classes.description: Class for handling binary configuration files.

classes.name: useradd
classes.description: Class for managing user account creation during build.

methods.name: cups_sysroot_preprocess
methods.description: Preprocesses the sysroot by adjusting the cups-config script to set the data directory and server binary path.
